NUMPOLLIES 6

//floor
0.0 0.0 -10.0 -10.0 10.0
0.0 1.0 -10.0 -10.0 -80.0
1.0 1.0 10.0 -10.0 -80.0

0.0 0.0 -10.0 -10.0 10.0
1.0 0.0 10.0 -10.0 10.0
1.0 1.0 10.0 -10.0 -80.0

//left
0.0 1.0 -10.0 -10.0 10.0
1.0 1.0 -10.0 -10.0 -80.0
1.0 0.0 0.0 10.0 -80.0

0.0 1.0 -10.0 -10.0 10.0
0.0 0.0 0.0 10.0 10.0
1.0 0.0 0.0 10.0 -80.0

//right
1.0 1.0 10.0 -10.0 10.0
0.0 1.0 10.0 -10.0 -80.0
0.0 0.0 0.0 10.0 -80.0

1.0 1.0 10.0 -10.0 10.0
1.0 0.0 0.0 10.0 10.0
0.0 0.0 0.0 10.0 -80.0
